actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Livestock, Dairy, and Poultry.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Livestock, Dairy, and Poultry

official_title: To establish a temporary minimum price for Class II and Class III milk under Federal milk marketing orders, and for other purposes.
short_title: Save Our Dairy Farmers Act of 2009

summary.text: Save Our Dairy Farmers Act of 2009 - Establishes the temporary minimum price for Class II and Class III milk under federal milk marketing orders as: (1) $17.23 per hundredweight for Class II milk; and (2) $16.81 per hundredweight for Class III milk. Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to report to Congress regarding dairy price stabilization options.

titles.title: Save Our Dairy Farmers Act of 2009
To establish a temporary minimum price for Class II and Class III milk under Federal milk marketing orders, and for other purposes.
